mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, title = #{title}, body = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, B.name AS board__name FROM article AS A
LEFT JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id
INNER JOIN board AS B ON A.boardId = B.id
WHERE A.boardId = #{boardId}
ORDER BY A.id DESC
